Resilient Systems REST API: fullOrgDTO
  • Resources
  • Data Types
  • Back to Top
  1. Home
  2. XML
  3. fullOrgDTO

fullOrgDTO Data Type

Namespace
(Default)
Properties
name data type type namespace min/max occurs description
actions_framework_enabled boolean element 1/1 Indicates whether the org has enabled and is allowed to use the actions framework.
artifact_types (custom) element 0/1 Relatability settings for incident artifact types.
The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the artifact type. The value portion contains the orgIncidentArtifactTypeDTO.
NOTE: This is deprecated in version 28. Please use incident_artifact_types instead.
attachments_enabled boolean element 1/1 Can attachments be added to tasks and incidents for this org?
attachments_used_bytes long element 1/1 The number of bytes the organization is currently using for attachment storage. If this value is not requested, it will be returned as -1. To retrieve this value, see GET /orgs/{orgId}/settings
automation_types (custom) element 0/1  
breach_enabled boolean element 1/1 Is the breach/privacy module enabled?
canada_enabled boolean element 1/1 Does the license enable Canada regulators?
eu_enabled boolean element 1/1 Does the license enable EU regulators?
field_value_modifications (custom) element 0/1  
geos (custom) element 0/1 A map of geo ID to orgGeoDTO. This identifies jurisdictions (geos) the company conducts business and/or has customer data.
groups (custom) element 0/1 A map of group ID to groupDTO. This map contains all of the groups defined in the organization.
id int element 0/1 The organization ID.
inc_deletion_allowed boolean element 1/1  
incident_artifact_types (custom) element 0/1 Incident artifact types for this organization. The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the artifact type. The value portion contains the incidentArtifactTypeDTO.
incident_severities (custom) element 0/1  
incident_types (custom) element 0/1 A map of incident type ID incidentTypeDTO. This is the list of incident types defined for the organization.

See also incidentDTO (incident_type_ids property).
org_info justOrgDTO element 0/1 General information about the organization.
phases (custom) element 0/1 A map of all the possible incident phases. The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the phase. The value portion contains the phaseDTO.
properties organizationPropertyDTO element 0/unbounded An array of organization properties. These are general purpose properties associated with the organization.
regs (custom) element 0/1 A map of regulator ID to boolean values that indicates which regulators are enabled by default for the organization.
sir_enabled boolean element 1/1 Is the security module enabled?
task_categories (custom) element 0/1 A map of all the possible task categories. The ID portion of the map contains the ID of the category. The value portion contains the taskCategoryDTO.
threat_sources (custom) element 0/1 A map of threat sources for this organization. All threat sources that Co3 supports are included in this list. The "enabled" property will be set to false if it is not enabled for this organization. See threatSourceDTO.

The key portion of the map contains the ID of the threat source. The value portion of the map contains the threatSourceDTO
unknown_users (custom) element 0/1  
us_enabled boolean element 1/1 Does the license enable US regulators?
users (custom) element 0/1 Gets a user ID to userDTO map. This allows the caller to map the ID values returned by other APIs to user names.

Example

<fullOrgDTO>
  <org_info>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
    <addr>...</addr>
    <addr2>...</addr2>
    <city>...</city>
    <state>...</state>
    <zip>...</zip>
  </org_info>
  <us_enabled>...</us_enabled>
  <canada_enabled>...</canada_enabled>
  <eu_enabled>...</eu_enabled>
  <actions_framework_enabled>...</actions_framework_enabled>
  <attachments_enabled>...</attachments_enabled>
  <breach_enabled>...</breach_enabled>
  <sir_enabled>...</sir_enabled>
  <threat_sources>...</threat_sources>
  <phases>...</phases>
  <users>...</users>
  <unknown_users>...</unknown_users>
  <geos>...</geos>
  <groups>...</groups>
  <regs>...</regs>
  <properties>
    <id>...</id>
    <name>...</name>
    <value>...</value>
    <client_property>...</client_property>
  </properties>
  <incident_types>...</incident_types>
  <incident_artifact_types>...</incident_artifact_types>
  <id>...</id>
  <incident_severities>...</incident_severities>
  <task_categories>...</task_categories>
  <inc_deletion_allowed>...</inc_deletion_allowed>
  <automation_types>...</automation_types>
  <field_value_modifications>...</field_value_modifications>
</fullOrgDTO>
